runs.comm: fast and furious outside off, swing and a miss, bangs into Haddin's gloves
serious pace from Tait, that was a great bouncer headed straight for Kaye's helmet, he did well to duck under it
ooh, that's going as fast as they are coming into the batsman. Fast on the batsman's thighs, he awkwardly fends, it goes off his body very fast and fine for four leg byes
wide outside off this time, close to a wide. Kayes can't reach it
on the pads again, tries to work it away off the back foot to the leg side, but can't get enough on it

expertly done by Tait! After feeding him with thunderbolts at great pace, he slyly slips in the slower one, Kayes is unable to spot it and plays the straight drive very early, it tamely lobs up for mid on to run across and snaffle it.
full outside off, Ashraful tries to dig it out but plays it straight to point
shortens the length and angles it across Ashraful who attempts a short-arm pull and swishes in the air. Good pace from Dirk

taken! Great catch from Tait at third man. Ashraful played it well actually, angling the bat and looking to play the short ball down to third man, but timed it too well. It carried to the deep, and Tait ran across to take a nice tumbling catch inches off the turf. Well, you can forget all the run rate calculations unless Bangladesh make a fist of this chase
punched off the front foot through the covers, it was pitched up by Nannes and Shakib moved forward confidently to find the gap and a couple of runs
looks to off drive, can't time it too well and it goes straight to mid off. Dirk tumbles in his follow through
tucks him up with a short ball angling in, Shakib can't do much with it except get a single
short of a length, angling across the left-hander, lazy swing and a miss
very wide outside off and this time it is called a wide
very short and again very wide, this time down the leg side. Tait not so tight this over
whipped away off the pads, the violence in the shot was directly proportional to the lack of timing. Dribbles away towards midwicket for a couple
short outside off and Shakib pulls with all his might and misses, a gentle breeze blows across the ground thanks to his efforts
stays back and punches it down to mid off for a single
sliding on to Aftab's pads, he deflects it down to square leg
on Shakib's pads, but it is on to him at good pace and he can't get it away on the leg side
full outside off, Aftab comes down the track and drives it on the bounce to cover

well, this is not helping Bangladesh's cause at all. A nothing shot from Aftab against some very high quality fast bowling, he is down the track again, without much conviction. Nannes pitches it short of a length, and Aftab swishes the bat in clumsy fashion as it angles across, and gets a top edge that is taken easily
length ball angling across, defended off the back foot
nice square drive from Mahmudullah to get off the mark, the outfield is not the quickest and it slows down as it reaches the ropes.

Bangladesh are getting outclassed here by some wonderful fast bowling! Short of a length again, hustling the batsman into a false stroke, this time Mahmudullah goes for an unconvincing pull off a ball that was not short enough. It took the top edge again for a dolly to square leg inside the circle
pitched up on off stump, opens the face to run it to deep point
ooh, pacy outside off, that exploded after pitching and carried at good height to Haddin, Rahim was a day late on his square cut
angles into the batsman, he taps it to the leg side and gets a single
bangs it in again, but it slides down the leg side for a wide
short of a length outside off, no room for the cut shot, he gets it away for a single off the back foot to covers
more pace! Tait is bullying Rahim with serious pace, that thudded on to his gloves from short of a length on off stump
angles in and the batsman plays it away to square leg
good shot, he attempts the same stroke that contributed to Ashraful's demise, but upper cuts it very fine from short of a length. It flies away and thuds into the bounday boards at third man.
straightens the line and Rahim defends it down the ground
opens the face and runs it down to third man from outside off
darts into the left hander, cramping him for room, he defends it to point
similar ball, giving the batsman nothing to work with. Shakib defends with soft hands and they take a single
good length ball, angling across the right hander who shoulders arms
hot stuff from Nannes! Shortens the length this time and gets it to rise disconcertingly, Rahim fishes nervously outside off
over-pitched, but Rahim has too many things on his mind to worry about petty issues like timing. The cover drive goes feebly and straight to the cover fielder
played away with the turn to wide mid on
pitched up on leg stump, worked away off the pads to square leg
on off stump line, draws the batsman into the forward defensive
pulls out the sweep from well outside off to the fielder at deep midwicket
Smashed by Shakib! Length ball on middle, Shakib went down on one knee and swung it a few rows into the crowd
superb fielding by Warner, running across from square leg, to cut off a similar slog sweep from Shakib that went along the ground this time., Warner tumbled at the last moment to pull it in
pitched up outside off, Rahim presses forward and drives into the covers
pitched up on off stump, Shakib punches off the front foot straight to the cover fielder
similar ball, and Shakib again fails to find the gap, this time it goes to mid of
shortens the length outside off, he opens the face and runs it straight to Warner at point, who just misses the stumps at the bowler's end. Shakib might have been gone if that hit
full on off stump, driven to long off for a single
short of a length outside off, stays back and plays it softly to the off side for a single
pitched up outside off and Shakib swings it away with the spin to wide long on where another good save keeps him down to two. The batsmen nearly collided into each other
shorter and straighter, worked away to the leg side for two more. More dodgy running, but Rahim survives since the throw misses
play and a miss just outside the off stump
swings it away square this time and Australia are in no mood to give them boundaries. More wonderful fielding in the deep
play and a miss outside off and Haddin misses it too, but it does not go too far
tucked away off the pads with the turn into the leg side for a strike-retaining single
heave ho! short on off stump line, Shakib looks to make room and free his arms through the off side, but misses the ball
another short ball, forces Shakib into a hurried pull, and the top edge falls safe behind square leg
Rahim opens the face and taps to the off side
Shot! Rahim picks the length early and tees away, straight over long on. The timing was perfect, that was right out of the screws
plan and a miss outside off, he misses the nurdle to get off the strike
another boundary! Good timing from Rahim, that was short outside off, he backed away and cut it, just over the fingers of point who was leaping high in the air
short and turning into the batsman who swings it away to the leg side.
pitched up and turning away, he tries to play it to the off side, but it goes straight to short third man
short and cut away into the covers

Mr. Cricket earns his side a big wicket! Pitched up and Shakib swings it away high behind square, but there was a hint of top edge as it looped towards deep square leg. Hussey initially misjudged it and ran too far inside, but reassessed in time, to back-pedal and dive full stretch to his back and pluck it a few metres inside the ropes!
tossed up on off, he gets forward and defends
shorter this time, Naeem stays back and plays it to long on
nudged to the leg side but can't get it away for runs
Naeem lofts a big six! Offie spinning into him, he went down on a knee and slog swept it cleanly over long on
play and a miss outside off, it was pushed through this time

another one bites the dust! Bangladesh are crumbling here! Naeem went for that slog swing over long on, but the timing was average this time and it was a comfortable take for long on running to his right
fires it outside off and Rahim can't get it away for runs in the off side
tossed up on leg stump, he gets forward and blocks
drives it off the front foot from middle stump, into the covers for a couple
looks to cut from outside off and does not make contact
pitched up again, draws the batsman forward for a cover drive
they are not going down without a fight! Bangladesh are coneecting with most of these slog sweeps, this was played against the spin, but timed really well and it sailed over long on easily
loses control of that one in bizarre fashion, it goes very wide outside off
short ball bunts it into the offside for a couple.
another slog sweep, does not make contact
Bangladesh are dying by the sword here. Rahim tries the slog sweep yet again, and gets the top edge, it swirls high and straight down the throat of Hussey senior at long leg
played away to square leg for one, with the turn
play and a miss to the ball pitched up outside off, Haddin whips the bails off, but the batsman got in just in time
ooh, nearly played right back to David Hussey, who almost took a good return catch
nice shot. Pitched up outside off, Shafiul made some room and squeezed the cover drive through the gap between mid off and cover for four
shortens the length and follows the batsman this time, cramping him for room, he still gets a single
angles into the batsman, and he manages to get it into the leg side for one
again, follows the batsman as he moves to the leg side, and he can only meekly deflect it straight to midwicket
goes aerial this time with the flick, and it lands before reaching the fielder in the deep
fast sull toss outside off, swishes at it and gets it over cover for a single into the outfield
whoa! Monster hit! Enticing ball from Smith, who has kept flighting it outside off, and the batsman backed himself with the expansive golf swing, it landed well over long off
full toss, tries to whack it away to the leg side, but can't time it too well
nice bit of flight. foxes him as he tries to loft over the covers, but the edge falls safe, to the right of short third man
and he gets his man this time! Shafiul looks to charge Smith again, who sticks to his guns and keeps it relatively full. Shafiul does not get to the pitch and inside edges it on to the wood work
Nice shot, clears his front foot away and base-ball bats it away into the gap between cover and mid off for four
shortens the length, and he again looks to clear his front foot away and go up and over the cover fielder
pitched up outside off, Mortaza can't quite pull the off side slog off, it goes on the bounce straight to cover
short and straight, Mortaza is pegged back, he opens the face and gets it into the off side for a quick one

The old fat lady is clearing her throat. You can slog big Dirk away once or twice, but he is eventually going to get you. Short of a length outside off and the batsman backs away again looking for the swipe over the off side, it takes the top edge and swirls up for a simple catch for the fielder inside the circle at cover
thickish outside edge first ball, and it flies away for four. Dirk finishes a fine spell, the best ever by an Aussie bowler - 4-0-18-4
short of a length on leg stump, fended away awkwardly and they take a single
full and fast on leg stump, worked away off the toes straight to Clarke at midwicket
back of a length angling across the batsman, who stays back and taps it to the offside, not for runs
slower ball on a length, and decieved the batsman all ends up. He was early on the attempted heave over midwicket and it went no where
good pacy bouncer, the batsman weaves away as it thuds into Haddin's gloves
what an over! It's a maiden and he rounds it off with another fast one that moves away a shade after pitching outside off. The tail-ender had no chance of getting any bat on it. Two maidens for Tait.
digs out a yorker and gets it away through the gap at extra cover
short ball, he is early into the pull and a rare fumble at mid on gives him two
identical ball, identical shot, but great fielding from Clarke running across from midwicket. He even underarms a throw as he is falling, but it misses

And it is all over! Full and straight on the stumps, Mortaza tries to be cheeky and gets across, trying to shovel it fine on the leg side, but makes no contact. Stumps are down, Bangladesh are finished, Pakistan and Australia are through to the next round.
